subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chase Utley homered and drove in the go-ahead run with a double in the sixth inning, Jimmy Rollins hit his National League-leading sixth home run and a beleaguered bullpen pitched three scoreless innings as Philadelphia won at home for the first time in five tries, beating the Houston Astros, 8-5, last night.
snippet: Chase Utley homered and drove in the go-ahead run with a double in the sixth inning, Jimmy Rollins hit his National League-leading sixth home run and a beleaguered bullpen pitched three scoreless innings as Philadelphia won at home for the first time...
